mapper.select: SELECT user_No, user_Id, user_Pw, user_Name, user_Phone, user_Email, email_Auth, reg_Date, user_Division FROM user_tbl WHERE user_Id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE user_tbl SET user_division = '탈퇴', withdraw_date = sysdate WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select reserve_no, user_name, reserve_item_name, reserve_option_name, clean_date, reserve_request from (SELECT reserve_no, user_name, reserve_item_name, reserve_option_name, clean_date, reserve_request, rownum as rnum FROM (select reserve_no, user_name, reserve_item_name, reserve_option_name, clean_date, reserve_request from reserve where user_id = #{userId} )) WHERE rnum between #{sizePerPage}*#{page}-9 and #{sizePerPage}*#{page} ORDER BY clean_date desc

SELECT reserve_request, reserve_no, user_id, reserve_item_name, reserve_item_price, reserve_option_name, reserve_option_price, reserve_date, reserve_addr, reserve_state, clean_done FROM reserve WHERE reserve_no = #{reserveNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE reserve SET reserve_request = '취소요청', reserve_state = '예약대기' , cancel_date = sysdate WHERE reserve_no = #{reserveNo} AND user_id = #{userId} AND clean_done = 'N' AND (reserve_request = '예약요청' OR reserve_request = '예약완료')
